name: ToysPeriod
tag_list: lego, toys, online-shop, speakers, gadgets, vintage, rare, toy, store, lego-art, toy-trains, model-railroading, toy-blog, custom-lego
overview:
ToysPeriod is an online store offering a growing selection of vintage and hard-to-find LEGO sets including Castle, Space, Pirate and Town themes, as well as Technic, along with exclusive LEGO-based consumer electronics.

The shop also features N, HO scale model trains, track and scenery plus safe, non-toxic BRIO wooden railway toys from Sweden.

ToysPeriod carries both used and new items, with a focus on high quality European-made toys and trains.

The store includes an online gallery of high resolution photos of many classic LEGO sets from the nineteen eighties and nineties. New and unique items are offered regularly.

The store also offers to assist with the acquisition of vintage or hard-to-find items.

The Toys Period store motto is “Always First… Always Mint”. According to Toys Period, this stands for first in service, first in product selection, first in quality, delivered in the best possible condition.
